attributes.action: Make Morrissey the next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steven Patrick Morrissey (born May 22, 1959) is an English singer and songwriter of Irish descent from Manchester, England.
He rose to prominence in the 1980s as the vocalist of the English band The Smiths. When the band broke up in 1987, Morrissey began a successful solo career, racking up ten Top 10 singles in the UK.

The next Prime Minister of Britain looks set to be a dour and moody Scotsman. Im all for a Prime Minister to be more down to earth, but why not one who can sing?

Lets be honest, Morrissey would be a fantastic Prime Minister....

Sign this petition and to the nation proud.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
